alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 2:00PM MST until November 29 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches expected. * WHERE...Laramie Valley including the city of Laramie. The lowest snow totals will generally be found around Laramie. * WHEN...5 PM MST this afternoon until 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and very low visibilities in falling snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
